author: Eric Hotton
text:
The City of Palm Bay, Florida, began a volunteer program one year ago and now has more volunteers applying than its available computer and software-license resources can support. If your volunteer program overcame a similar issue, please share the techniques you actually employed to successfully place more volunteers.
Responses can be either posted here or sent directly to Eric Hotton, Community Services Coordinator, at hottoe@pbfl.org.
Thank you for your consideration.
title: Computer and software-license resources for volunteers
